ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and you are conveyed on them and on ships as well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And you are carried on them and on boats.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and are carried on them and also on ships.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You are carried by the animals on land and by the ships in the sea.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And you are carried on them and on the ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And on them, and on ships you are carried.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And on them and on the ships you are borne.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and upon them, and on the ships, you are borne.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And on them and on the ship ye are carried.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and you ride on them as you do in ships.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And on them and on the ship ye are borne.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and you are carried on them and on ships.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And on them, as well as in ships, ye ride.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And on them, and on ships you are carried.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and upon them and on the ships you are carried.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And on them, and on the ships, you are transported.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And upon them and on ships you are carried.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:22] And on them, the camels, and on ships you are carried.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And on them) and on camels, on land (and on the ship) in the sea (you are carried) you travel.
